Detailed Description

template<class IntegratorType>
class IntegratorContext< IntegratorType >

Template class that defines the context for the integrator.

The IntegratorContext class is a template class with template type defining the type of integrator (Gillespie, modified Gillespie, etc). It contains an IntegratorType object and uses its integrateOneStep() function.
